title: Prohibits male correction officers from pat frisking female inmates
summary: Prohibits male correction officers from pat frisking female inmates unless such officer has probable cause that a pat frisk is necessary to prevent escape or to protect other inmates or prison employees.

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  correction law, in relation to prohibiting male
         correction officers from pat frisking female inmates

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
